chapters.title: Chapter 2: The Dark One's Touch
chapters.info: Turanine Merdagon, p. 129—Aes Sedai of unknown Ajah. She had a strong face, tilted eyes, a hooked nose, and straight white hair to her waist. She died when Beonin was still one of the Accepted, but Beonin saw her ghost outside Tar Valon.
